properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:24AM CST until February 14 at 4:50PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River at Oliver
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...


.Heavy rainfall of three to five inches is forecast over the Black
Warrior River basin during the next 48 hours...and a flood warning
remains in effect along much of the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam.
* from Tuesday morning to Friday afternoon...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 7:30 AM Monday the stage was 117.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 129 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Tuesday morning  and continue
to rise to near 137.9 feet by early Wednesday afternoon. The river
will fall below flood stage by early Friday morning.
* Impact...At 135 feet...Numerous camphouses and some permanent
residences southwest of Tuscaloosa become cutoff. Widespread
flooding of lowlands in the area will occur.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
